sub_title: Business Development, Sales Channel Manager,Buyer, Sourcing Agent, Product Development,Supplier,Distributor.
summary:
We are an import and export company on non-food and food item.  Our roles : Buying, Sourcing, Commercial Agent, Distributor, Product Development on Private Labeling and Non Private labeling from a design, item/material sourcing, sampling, production, inspection and logistics internationally.

Our role as an agent/distributor on food time involves importing products and representing the manufacturer's brand or providing OEM label for retailers if such request is required.  Our tasks involves management of all market research, approach potential clients with samples, taking orders, invoice arrangement, shipment & after sales service by replenishing orders. We approach local and overseas retailers and this expose the manufacturer's brand/products extensively.

Our role in the Buying/Sourcing management on non food items specialize in Corporate Promotional Gifts & Bags/Event Management Gifts, liaise with qualified factories, arrange sampling, arrange inspection during production, arrange any certificates needed from clients, logistics and distribution domestically and internationally. We design and customize items as well for our Corporate clients based on their budget and any other requests. 

Bags Journey takes you on a more than just a smooth promising journey of products since 2006.

Good Business is born with Great Service - It represents us.

contributors.headline: Business Development, Sales Channel Manager,Buyer, Sourcing Agent, Product Development,Supplier,Distributor.

profile_positions.description:
We are an import and export company on non-food and food item.  We are an agent, distributor &  buyer.

We have two divisions in the company: Food and Non Food item.

Our role as an agent/distributor on food involves importing products representing the manufacturer's brand or providing OEM label for retailers if such request is required.  Our tasks involves management of all market research, approach potential clients with samples, taking orders, invoice arrangement, shipment & after sales service by replenishing orders. Our business expands to other designated European countries and Asia. 

Our role as a buyer/sourcing management on non food items specialize in Corporate Promotional Gifts & Bags, liaise with qualified factories, arrange sampling, arrange inspection during production, arrange any certificates needed from clients, logistics and distribution domestically and internationally. We design and customize items as well for our Corporate clients based on their budget and any other requests. 

Bags Journey takes you on a more than just a smooth promising journey of products since 2006.

Good Business is born with Great Service - It represents us.
profile_positions.title: Entrepreneur

profile_positions.description: I was the Sales & Marketing Manager. I helped to set-up the company which included the arrangement of recruitment ads, conducted interviews, shortlisted candidates, conducted sales & marketing training, set-up sales & marketing team, organized roadshows nationwide, arranged Point of Sales materials & designing of company's leaflets/brochures/profile, established strategic alliance partners,  liaised closely with telcos, organized and conducted sales training for nationwide sales agents/distributors, organized roadshows nationwide, worked closely with the Director of the company, created and worked towards company's vision & goal & created short term and long term goals.
profile_positions.title: Sales & Marketing Manager

skills: Import & Distribution of Corporate Gifts & Promotional Gifts
Liason between factory and headoffice on production
Design & Customize design on all types of bags/pouch for Corporate
